{"id":815086648,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1664898061,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/815086648/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Replace All ?'s to Avoid Consecutive Repeating Characters","memory":"43.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String modifyString(String s) {\n        char[] ch = s.toCharArray();\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(ch[i]=='?')\n                for(char j='a';j<='c';j++){ // j = (a-z) is not required.\n                    if(i>0 && ch[i-1]==j) continue; // skip if previous character is one of a,b,c\n                    if(i<s.length()-1 && ch[i+1]==j) continue; //skip if next character is one of a,b,c\n                    ch[i] = j; //set with the current character from a,b,c\n                    break;\n                }\n        }\n        return String.valueOf(ch);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"replace-all-s-to-avoid-consecutive-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
